means: 英国国教高派教会之教徒

sentence.Network_en: It presented in satirical terms points made in earnest by Catholic writers.
sentence.Network_cn: 它用讽刺的语言呈现了天主教作家郑重其事表明的观点。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Thomas was taught by the Catholic nuns whose school he attended.
sentence.Network_cn: 托马斯先生是在天主教修女创办的学校接受的教育。

sentence.Network_en: The difference is, you are Anglo-Saxons, we are Latins.
sentence.Network_cn: 差异在于，你们是英国血统，而我们是拉丁裔的。

entry.tran: （仍坚持承袭天主教传统的）英国国教高教会派的
entry.def: The Anglo-Catholic part of the Church of England, or of the churches related to it, is the part whose beliefs and practices are similar to those of the Catholic Church.

example.tran: 英国国教高教会派的牧师

entry.tran: 英国国教高教会派教徒
entry.def: An Anglo-Catholic is a Christian who belongs to the Anglo-Catholic section of the Church of England, or to the churches related to it.

auth_sentence.content: Her hopes for a Catholic England died with her.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her hopes for a Catholic England died with her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her hopes for a Catholic England died with her.

auth_sentence.content: No - the Catholic Church is alive and well.
auth_sentence.res_content: No - the Catholic Church is alive and well.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No - the Catholic Church is alive and well.

auth_sentence.content: The Catholic priesthood is successor to the Jewish priesthood.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Catholic priesthood is successor to the Jewish priesthood.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Catholic priesthood is successor to the Jewish priesthood.
